mapper.sql: select ul.user_id, ul.lecture_id, oauth_id, username, password, nickname, phone, point, mission_score, role, category_name, platform, lecture_title, instructor, url from user_lecture ul join lecture l on l.lecture_id = ul.lecture_id join user u on u.user_id = ul.user_id
mapper.select: select * from user_lecture where user_id=#{userId} and lecture_id=#{lectureId};
